api_list.name: GET One Character
api_list.description: GET one character from the MHA's API.

api_list.name: GET All Characters
api_list.description: GET all characters from the MHA's API.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://alterego.p.rapidapi.com/characters"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "alterego.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://alterego.p.rapidapi.com/characters"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "alterego.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
